'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

One of the more interesting wizards in Eora, Bekarna's research into stars and celestial affairs was a subject of grave importance to the Deadfire, though not to the [Archmages](/archmages/). When she presented her work to [the Circle of Archmagi](/theCircleOfArchmagi/), she was laughed out into the streets. Undaunted, she continued her work, eventually crossing paths with the [Hand Occult](/handOccult/) and becoming imprisoned in [The Halls Obscured](/theHallsObscured/) for seeking unauthorized revelation. As subject K-1121, her mental state steadily deteriorated, due to the isolation from her orrery that always helped her center herself.
